I am a data analyst and psychometrician with extensive experience analyzing complex statistical information using multivariate statistics. Competencies encompass wrangling data, conducting detailed data analysis, and rigorous technical documentation and presentation of complex statistical information. 7 years of experience in data wrangling and analysis in higher-education settings conducting psychometrics to evaluate reliability and validity evidence (e.g., factor analysis, structural equation modeling, and item response theory).
